code: import chats from'./data/inboxItems.json';var ONE_BY_ONE_CHARACHTERS_ENTERING='ONE-BY-ONE-CHARACHTERS-ENTERING';var ADD_NEW_MESSAGE='ADD-NEW-MESSAGE';export var currentValueOfTextArea='';var initialState={users:chats,messages:[{id:1,text:"- It's not easy to live your own way."},{id:2,text:"Because you can't blame anybody but yourself."},{id:3,text:"- I don't want to be a burden! I want to be useful."}]};export var InboxReducer=function InboxReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ONE_BY_ONE_CHARACHTERS_ENTERING:currentValueOfTextArea=action.desiredValue;return state;case ADD_NEW_MESSAGE:var count=state.messages.length;var item={id:count+1,text:action.desiredValue};state.messages.push(item);currentValueOfTextArea='';return state;default:return state;}};export var oneByOneCharachtersEnteringActionCreator=function oneByOneCharachtersEnteringActionCreator(desiredValue){return{type:ONE_BY_ONE_CHARACHTERS_ENTERING,desiredValue:desiredValue};};export var addNewMessageActionCreator=function addNewMessageActionCreator(desiredValue){return{type:ADD_NEW_MESSAGE,desiredValue:desiredValue};};
